module: Module-level comment: The "alt_vipitc131_common_fifo" module implements a configurable FIFO buffer capable of operating in single or dual-clock domains based on the `CLOCKS_ARE_SAME` parameter. It supports variable data widths and FIFO depths. This module selectively instantiates `scfifo` for a single-clock or `dcfifo` for dual-clock scenarios, managing data flow and control through specified ports and internal parameter settings, ensuring efficient FIFO operations adaptable to different system requirements.
